sql.item: select to_char(t1.start_time, 'dd"日" hh24"时"mi"分"') start_time, t1.mms_num now_num, t2.mms_num last_week_num, ROUND((t1.mms_num - t2.mms_num) / t2.mms_num, 2) comp_rate from (select t.start_time, t.mms_num from EMG_MMS t where t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_MMS)) t1, (select t.start_time, t.mms_num from EMG_MMS t where t.start_time = (select max(start_time) - 7 from EMG_MMS)) t2
select t.start_time, to_char(t.start_time, 'hh24') sort_time, t.mms_num from EMG_MMS t where t.start_time > (select max(start_time) - 7 / 24 from EMG_MMS) order by start_time

select to_char(t1.start_time, 'dd"日" hh24"时"mi"分"') start_time, t1.tel_traf_num now_num, t2.tel_traf_num last_week_num, ROUND((t1.tel_traf_num - t2.tel_traf_num) / t2.tel_traf_num, 2) comp_rate from (select t.start_time, t.tel_traf_num from EMG_TEL_TRAFFIC t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_TEL_TRAFFIC where region_id = ${region_id})) t1, (select t.start_time, t.tel_traf_num from EMG_TEL_TRAFFIC t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) - 7 from EMG_TEL_TRAFFIC where region_id = ${region_id})) t2

select t.start_time, to_char(t.start_time, 'hh24') sort_time, t.tel_traf_num from EMG_TEL_TRAFFIC t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time > (select max(start_time) - 7 / 24 from EMG_TEL_TRAFFIC where region_id = ${region_id}) order by start_time

select to_char(t1.start_time, 'dd"日" hh24"时"mi"分"') start_time, t1.lte_flow_num now_num, t2.lte_flow_num last_week_num, ROUND((t1.lte_flow_num - t2.lte_flow_num) / t2.lte_flow_num, 2) comp_rate from (select t.start_time, t.lte_flow_num from EMG_LTE_FLOW t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_LTE_FLOW where region_id = ${region_id})) t1, (select t.start_time, t.lte_flow_num from EMG_LTE_FLOW t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) - 7 from EMG_LTE_FLOW where region_id = ${region_id})) t2

select t.start_time, to_char(t.start_time, 'hh24') sort_time, t.lte_flow_num from EMG_LTE_FLOW t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time > (select max(start_time) - 7 / 24 from EMG_LTE_FLOW where region_id = ${region_id}) order by start_time

select to_char(t1.start_time, 'dd"日" hh24"时"mi"分"') start_time, t1.toll_traf_num now_num, t2.toll_traf_num last_week_num, ROUND((t1.toll_traf_num - t2.toll_traf_num) / t2.toll_traf_num, 2) comp_rate from (select t.start_time, t.toll_traf_num from EMG_TOLL_TRAFFIC t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_TOLL_TRAFFIC where region_id = ${region_id})) t1, (select t.start_time, t.toll_traf_num from EMG_TOLL_TRAFFIC t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) - 7 from EMG_TOLL_TRAFFIC where region_id = ${region_id})) t2

select t.start_time, to_char(t.start_time, 'hh24') sort_time, t.toll_traf_num from EMG_TOLL_TRAFFIC t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time > (select max(start_time) - 7 / 24 from EMG_TOLL_TRAFFIC where region_id = ${region_id}) order by start_time

select to_char(t1.start_time, 'dd"日" hh24"时"mi"分"') start_time, t1.group_flow_num now_num, t2.group_flow_num last_week_num, ROUND((t1.group_flow_num - t2.group_flow_num) / t2.group_flow_num, 2) comp_rate from (select t.start_time, t.group_flow_num from EMG_GROUP_FLOW t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_GROUP_FLOW where region_id = ${region_id})) t1, (select t.start_time, t.group_flow_num from EMG_GROUP_FLOW t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) - 7 from EMG_GROUP_FLOW where region_id = ${region_id})) t2

select t.start_time, to_char(t.start_time, 'hh24') sort_time, t.group_flow_num from EMG_GROUP_FLOW t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time > (select max(start_time) - 7 / 24 from EMG_GROUP_FLOW where region_id = ${region_id}) order by start_time
